price: Pero a quien se arrepienta luego de cometer un delito o injusticia y enmiende, Dios lo perdonará, porque Dios es Perdonador, Misericordioso.
arabic: فَمَن تَابَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ظُلۡمِهِۦ وَأَصۡلَحَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: faman tāba min baʿdi ẓul'mihi wa-aṣlaḥa fa-inna al-laha yatūbu ʿalayhi inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
